welcome_message_title: Welcome to Lake Norman of Catawba
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Lake Norman of Catawba! Known for its stunning scenery and charming small-town atmosphere, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Statesville Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a cafe, gift shop, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For private and corporate flights, Statesville Municipal Airport offers a separate terminal with luxurious amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Concord-Padgett Regional Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Concord-Padgett Regional Airport handles all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hickory Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hickory Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves American Airlines and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves a variety of airlines, including Delta, United, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is home to Southwest Airlines and a few other domestic carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rowan County Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rowan County Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
